閆字的基本解释

閆
yán
见“闫”。

閆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yán］
［《字彙》移廉切］
“闫1”的繁体字。同“閻1”。
(1)里巷。
(2)姓。唐有閆知微。见《说郛》卷二引唐张鷟《朝野佥载》。今本《朝野佥载》卷四作“閻”。

閆字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【門字部】　閆； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1330第11
【五音集韻】余廉切，音鹽。同閻義，俗用。　又【正字通】姓也。說文有閻無閆，今姓譜分爲二。

Yan

Yan
yán
See "Yan".
Yan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yán］
[Move Lianqie from "Words"]
Traditional characters of "闫1". Same as "Yan 1".
(1) Lane.
(2) Last name. Tang You Yan Zhiwei. See "Shuoyu" volume two quoted in Tang Zhang Zhuo's "Morality and Wilderness". The fourth volume of the current edition of "Morning and Wilderness" is called "Yan".
Yan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Xu Ji 1] [Door Character Department] 　 Yan; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 1330 to 11
【Pentagram rhyme】Yu Lianqie, tone salt. Same as Yan Yi, common use.　[Zhengzitong] The last name is also. It is said that there is Yan Wuyan in the text, and the surname is divided into two.
